entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind light except gusting to 70 km/h near thunderstorms early this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 24. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. 70 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
